Useful plugins 
===

| Plugin name |Description| limit |
|-------------|-----------|------
| [Agile](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/redmine_agile)  ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/19867)     |Display Redmine Issues as tasks cards on an Agile board, allowing teams to prioritize, assign and track issues efficiently. Move cards by drag&drop and customize them. Plan Sprint and Backlog easily with a drag& drop planner. Use charts to see the progress of the project. You can adjust the plugin settings for any methodology, process or workflow that your organization uses             |- require subscritption <br>- Free version is limted  
|[RedmineUP CRM](https://www.redmineup.com/pages/plugins/crm) ![](data:image/png;base64,)| Redmine isn’t just limited to project management. It can also be integrated with customer relationship and database management. Certain Redmine plugins make it a breeze to manage large contact lists.<br> The CRM plugin allows teams to access everything they need to know about their important contacts (customers or internal staff). You can also integrate it with other RedmineUP plugins so that all information pertaining to orders, tickets and projects is compiled in one spot.<br> The plugin also comes with a notes feature, visibility for related issues and the ability to send HTML-formatted emails straight from Redmine.<br> With the Pro version, you get to store more types of information including deals and attachments, kanban boards and time reports. You can also categorize on the basis of contact/deal groupings and custom fields in addition to bulk editing.| - require subscription <br> -limited free plan 
|[Monitoring & Controlling (M&C)](https://github.com/alexmonteiro/Redmine-Monitoring-Controlling)|If you’re looking for a lightweight plugin to build charts that give your project managers a 360-degree view of project progress, RedmineUP has you covered.<br>This Github plugin comes with no price tag attached to it. Though free and simple, it can be invaluable to managers who want at-a-glance updates on all ongoing projects. Also worthy of note is that this plugin features pie charts and column charts sorting issues by status type, manageable vs unmanageable, and which tasks are overdue.| - very limited features
|[RedmineUP Checklist](https://www.redmineup.com/pages/plugins/checklists)|This plugin is actually the highest rated to date on the Redmine marketplace, and it’s not hard to understand why. You can create your own checklist templates to save time and integrate them with the agile boards from the previous plugin. <br>Thanks to Ajax technology, the plugin can update instantaneously without compromising performance, and also provides a log of checklist version edits.| -limited free tier
|[Issue To Email](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/redmine_issue_to_email) ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/21117)| Plugin to bulk export issues to email containing all attachments as email attachments. Email issues look like real issue with clickable attachments. | 
|[Code Review](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/redmine_code_review) ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/4779)| Code Review is a plugin which lets you annotate source code within the repository browser.| 
|[People:  user directory](https://www.redmineup.com/pages/plugins/people)| This plugin gives Redmine a more “human” dimension, because it allows the users to upload their own photo or to give some personal data like their birthday. The plugin also extends the user profile with files and a user activity log. | -requires subscription <br> -limited free tier
| [Usability](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/usability) ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/12192) | Plugin for Redmine, which allows to improve the usability of Redmine.|
| [Pastebin](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/pastebin) ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/5544)| A pastebin is a convenient place for developers to share pieces of code, diffs and other text snippets.|
|[Repository plugin](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/redmine_repository) ![](https://www.redmine.org/attachments/download/6081) | This is a redmine repository plugin that allow to download files and folders from a repository in one zip archive.|
|[Advanced reminder](https://www.redmine.org/plugins/advanced_reminder) ![]()| E-mail notification of issues due date you are involved in (Assignee, Author, Watcher)|
|
